sentences.en: He had unmistakably been waving his flag to attract the referee's attention.
sentences.cn: 他显然一直在挥舞旗子吸引主裁判的注意。

sentences.en: He has apologised for critical remarks he made about the referee.
sentences.cn: 他为自己对裁判的出言不逊道了歉。

sentences.en: He is clearly too partisan to be a referee.
sentences.cn: 他倾向性过于明显，当不了裁判。

sentences.en: He was sent off for arguing with the referee.
sentences.cn: 他因为和裁判发生争执而被罚出场。

sentences.en: He was suspended for one year because he head-butted the referee after the match for being dissatisfied with his judgment.
sentences.cn: 由于对裁判的判决不满，比赛结束后他用头撞了那名裁判，为此他受到停赛一年的处罚。

sentences.en: He's now facing suspension after a dust-up with the referee.
sentences.cn: 在与裁判发生争执后他现在面临着停赛。

sentences.en: His headmaster agreed to act as his referee.
sentences.cn: 他的校长同意做他的推荐人。

sentences.en: Referee Michael Reed had no hesitation in awarding a penalty.
sentences.cn: 裁判迈克尔·里德毫不犹豫地判了点球。

sentences.en: The referee blew his whistle for a penalty.
The referee blew his whistle for full time.
sentences.cn: 裁判吹响了比赛结束的哨音。

sentences.en: The referee booked him for a tussle with the goalie.
sentences.cn: 他和守门员拉扯，因而被裁判记名警告。

sentences.en: The referee finally blew the whistle to stop the game.
sentences.cn: 裁判最后吹响了终场的哨声。

sentences.en: The referee has to think the way the players do.
sentences.cn: 裁判必须从运动员的角度考虑问题。

sentences.en: The referee ignored voices baying for a penalty.
sentences.cn: 裁判对要求判罚点球的叫喊声不予理睬。

sentences.en: They were rather less than charitable towards the referee.
sentences.cn: 他们对裁判根本不体谅。

sentences.en: Vautrot has refereed in two World Cups.
sentences.cn: 沃特罗特已经在两届世界杯比赛中担任过裁判。

sentences.en: White was in no doubt the referee made the correct decision.
sentences.cn: 怀特确信裁判作出了公正的判罚。
